entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:53 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
